root.name: Alcazar: The Forgotten Fortress
root.description: PLOTPlot, What Plot? The game starts you with a bunch of castles with one big castle at the end.GAMEPLAYThe gameplay is made up of pretty broken gameplay. Games like Contra do this style much better. Think of Contra style gameplay but you have to be moving to be able to shoot but to change weapons you must be standing still.
